metadata.name: Born to be sacrificed
metadata.description:
Influenced by the master of dreams Salvador Dali.

A custom illustration of a tale ‘Born to be sacrificed’ from the album Nephel's Dream by dOP. This Christmas song or more precisely this Anti - Christmas song is a musical sarcasm from Jonathan Illel and Damien Vandesande. They have a long tradition started 20 years ago of reuniting and composing a song on that night.
dOP could not resist to bring some irony, play with the sacred and illuminate some darker angles of this celebration.

Listen: https://open.spotify.com/track/5Uc5n5mD31YXDO5Aymrg8F?si=jOWcjPsUS7qYb2QJr7lrjg

Subscribe on https://www.nephelsdream.com to be informed of the next releases and exhibitions. 

More information about dOP: https://linktr.ee/dOP

First collector will receive a signed BW original hand-drawing and receive a limited edition of vinyl ‘Nephel’s Dream’ signed by dOP.

•••

On permanent display at the digital part of Louvre, Paris since 2023

Size: 6940 x 9836 pixels, 600 dpi
